title: The Workers Savings and Loan Bank Act
title_en: The Workers Savings and Loan Bank Act
short_name: Workers Savings and Loan Bank Act

provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Notice may be cited as the Workers Savings and Loan Bank
(Date of Commencement of Business) Notice, 1973.

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2. The 15th August, 1973, is hereby notified as being the date of
commencement of business by the Workers Savings and Loan Bank.
